messages.title: A strong voice for Strathkelvin & Bearsden
messages.content: An apprenticeship for those who want one, training for the unemployed, safer communities, reduced waiting times for cancer care and a focus on education from nursery to university. These are the issues that really matter and those I'll be campaigning on for the people of Strathkelvin & Bearsden.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: An apprenticeship for those who want one, training for the unemployed.
Reduced waiting times for cancer care.
A focus on education from nursery to university.

issues.education: A focus on education from nursery to university.
issues.health: Reduced waiting times for cancer care.
